Posts.Content: Aug 13, 2009 09:33PM KCgiam wrote: Hang in there Joani, you will feel well again.  In 2003 I had bone mets on my lumbar spine and hip bones.  Could barely walk and couldn't stand upright.  After completing radiation, I was my normal self again.  Didn't need the wheelchair or cane anymore.  Went skiing the following winter. Of course I've been on chemo ever since.  Have had other problems but the bone mets have remained stable and not bothersome all these years.  good luck
Posts.Title: Now bone mets, need encouragement wayover20 kbugmom
